artist: Utagawa Kuniharu Published by Iwatoya Kisaburō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: kneeling young woman in foreground, looking back over her PR shoulder; woman wears pink kimono with white flowers and purple obit with white foliage design; young woman holds the hand of a figure standing behind her, holding an umbrella in his PR hand and wearing a pink kimono with similar floral pattern
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Seal

Bandō Mitsugorō {Kuniharu ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Memorial Portraits of Bandō Mitsugorō III and Segawa Kikunojō V
